## AuthHandler.parseAuthorizationRequest() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

unpacks authorization request 

**Signature:**

```typescript
parseAuthorizationRequest(request: Uint8Array): Promise<AuthorizationRequestMessage>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | Uint8Array | raw byte message |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[AuthorizationRequestMessage](./js-sdk.authorizationrequestmessage.md)&gt;

`Promise<AuthorizationRequestMessage>`
